findings.title: MT - Mints Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint tokens and can take advantage of it by calling the mint function, potentially leading to highly inflated contract tokens.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to ensure they cannot be changed after being set, which decreases gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not conform to Solidity naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can occur due to conditional statements that are always false, functions that are never called, or unreachable code, making a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, and increasing its size and deployment cost.
